description: This treasured baked salmon family recipe ticks all the boxes. Coat salmon pieces in a tasty truffle mustard mixture before baking to amp up the flavour.
name: Baked Salmon With Truffle Mustard Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Grease a baking dish and line with baking paper. Thinly slice one lemon. Place salmon, skin-side down, in the baking dish.
Juice remaining lemon into a bowl. Add parsley, garlic, mustard and oil. Mix well.
Spoon parsley mixture evenly over the top of salmon. Season.
Arrange lemon slices over the parsley mixture. Bake for 15 minutes for medium, or until cooked to your liking. Remove from oven. Stand for 5 minutes, then serve with salad leaves.
